subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Simon Gerrans of Australia won the 185-mile Milan to San Remo classic, edging the Swiss standout Fabian Cancellara and the top Italian hope Vincenzo Nibali in a three-man sprint finish.
snippet: Simon Gerrans of Australia won the 185-mile Milan to San Remo classic, edging the Swiss standout Fabian Cancellara and the top Italian hope Vincenzo Nibali in a three-man sprint finish.
